#summary QERP Developer Guide.

= Introduction =

QERP is developed using Java programming language
 * [http://tapestry.apache.org/tapestry5/ Tapestry 5] framework for frontend Web UI
 * EJB3 for backend

Currently, QERP is developed to run on [http://geronimo.apache.org/ Apache Geronimo] only. In the future, we have plan to make the code to run on [http://www.jboss.org/ JBoss], [https://glassfish.dev.java.net/ GlassFish] and etc.
